embed.description: Hello. I am a silver Yasuo main coming to teach you plebs how to turn your Trashuo into Godsuo. Yasuo is an extremely easy champion as of now. He has so many tools to deal with every situation and get penta kills wherever he walks.

replies.body:
Let's take a look... Mhmm, mhmm, yes; I see....

It's fine. Grabbing 20% attack speed to free up an item slot and grab Merc Treads is a decent idea. I prefer taking AD and Lifesteal over attack speed, thus relegating Merc Treads to a situational buy.
sorry but anything about yasuo gets downvoted because people pick mages into him and poop all over the chair because they don't know how to counterplay him. sadly.

Step 1: Pick Yasuo

Step 2: ???

Step 3: Profit
